info.name: Material Dark Trello
info.description: A Material Dark Trello Theme by CharlieEtienne https://github.com/CharlieEtienne/material-trello 3 themes available : Oceanic, Darker, Palenight If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
info.additionalInfo:
Colors based on VSCode Material Theme by Mattia Astorino
https://github.com/equinusocio/vsc-material-theme

Most of CSS based on Digital Dark Style by Michael Fabian 'Xaymar' Dirks
https://github.com/Xaymar/Trello-Digital-Dark

CHANGELOG: 

08/08/2019:
    - Rewrite with variables
    - Convert all colors to hsla
    - ADD TWO NEW THEMES "Material Darker" AND "Material Palenight" AVAILABLE IN SETTINGS!

18/06/2019: 
    - Fix background
    - Fix boards menu
    - Fix notifications menu
    - Fix colors in homepage
    - Fix glitch with stickers (thanks to @Lachlan Menzies)
    - Other minor fixes (links hover colors, etc.)
